newsitem.title: USA: Ligand converts AHP debt to stock.
newsitem.headline: Ligand converts AHP debt to stock.

text.p: Ligand Pharmaceuticals Inc said on Friday that it will convert $3.75 million of its $10 million loan from American Home Products Corp (AHP) into 374,626 shares of Ligand Common stock.
The convertible note was part of a September 1994 pact between the companies for the discovery and development of drugs that interact with the estrogen or progesterone receptors.
The drugs could be used in hormone replacement therapy, anti-cancer therapy, gynecological diseases, central nervous system disorders associated with menopause, contraception and osteoporosis.
